Deprecated API

Contents

  • Methods
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    org.apache.rat.mp.AbstractRatMojo.setAddDefaultLicenses(boolean)
    Deprecated for removal since 0.17: Use <configurationNoDefaults> instead (note the change of state).
    org.apache.rat.mp.RatCheckMojo.setAddLicenseHeaders(String)
    use <editLicense> and <editOverwrite>
    org.apache.rat.mp.RatCheckMojo.setCopyrightMessage(String)
    Deprecated for removal since 0.17: Use <editCopyright> instead.
    org.apache.rat.mp.RatCheckMojo.setReportFile(File)
    use 'out' property.
    org.apache.rat.mp.RatCheckMojo.setReportStyle(String)
    use setStyleSheet or xml
    org.apache.rat.mp.RatReportMojo.generate(Sink, Locale)
    use RatReportMojo.generate(Sink, SinkFactory, Locale) instead.
    org.apache.rat.mp.RatReportMojo.generate(Sink, Locale)
    use RatReportMojo.generate(Sink, SinkFactory, Locale) instead.
    org.apache.rat.plugin.BaseRatMojo.setAddLicense(boolean)
    Deprecated for removal since 0.17: Use <editLicense> instead.
    org.apache.rat.plugin.BaseRatMojo.setCopyright(String)
    Deprecated for removal since 0.17: Use <editCopyright> instead.
    org.apache.rat.plugin.BaseRatMojo.setExclude(String)
    Deprecated for removal since 0.17: Use <inputExclude> instead.
    org.apache.rat.plugin.BaseRatMojo.setExcludeFile(String)
    Deprecated for removal since 0.17: Use <inputExcludeFile> instead.
    org.apache.rat.plugin.BaseRatMojo.setExcludes(String[])
    Deprecated for removal since 0.17: Use <inputExclude> instead.
    org.apache.rat.plugin.BaseRatMojo.setForce(boolean)
    Deprecated for removal since 0.17: Use <editOverwrite> instead.
    org.apache.rat.plugin.BaseRatMojo.setInclude(String)
    Deprecated for removal since 0.17: Use <inputInclude> instead.
    org.apache.rat.plugin.BaseRatMojo.setIncludes(String[])
    Deprecated for removal since 0.17: Use <inputInclude> instead.
    org.apache.rat.plugin.BaseRatMojo.setIncludesFile(String)
    Deprecated for removal since 0.17: Use <inputIncludeFile> instead.
    org.apache.rat.plugin.BaseRatMojo.setLicenses(String)
    Deprecated for removal since 0.17: Use <config> instead.
    org.apache.rat.plugin.BaseRatMojo.setLicenses(String[])
    Deprecated for removal since 0.17: Use <config> instead.
    org.apache.rat.plugin.BaseRatMojo.setListFamilies(String)
    Deprecated for removal since 0.17: Use <outputFamilies> instead.
    org.apache.rat.plugin.BaseRatMojo.setListLicenses(String)
    Deprecated for removal since 0.17: Use <outputLicenses> instead.
    org.apache.rat.plugin.BaseRatMojo.setNoDefaultLicenses(boolean)
    Deprecated for removal since 0.17: Use <configurationNoDefaults> instead.
    org.apache.rat.plugin.BaseRatMojo.setOut(String)
    Deprecated for removal since 0.17: Use <outputFile> instead.
    org.apache.rat.plugin.BaseRatMojo.setScanHiddenDirectories(boolean)
    Deprecated for removal since 0.17: Use <inputIncludeStd> with 'HIDDEN_DIR' argument instead.
    org.apache.rat.plugin.BaseRatMojo.setStylesheet(String)
    Deprecated for removal since 0.17: Use <outputStyle> instead.
    org.apache.rat.plugin.BaseRatMojo.setXml(boolean)
    Deprecated for removal since 0.17: Use <outputStyle> with the 'xml' argument instead.
